column1: Nsanje (formerly Port Herald) is the main town in Nsanje District within the Southern Region of Malawi.
The city has a railway station on the Sena railway
column2: part of the Malawi Railways. The railway through Nsanje that connects Blantyre with Beira
column3: Mozambique was severely disrupted by the Mozambique Civil War and remains closed. The main road north connecting the town to the rest of Malawi is being upgraded.
